body_html: Hi @djsaunde, I thought about your application, I think torch.ger(S, S) can be replaced by unsqueeze(S) + mm(S, S), we have unsqueeze() already (Thanks @umanwizard !), I can work on mm(S, S) for you if you still need it. It would be very helpful if you can point me to places that use torch.ger in your model.

body: Hi @djsaunde, I thought about your application, I think `torch.ger(S, S)` can be replaced by `unsqueeze(S)` + `mm(S, S)`, we have `unsqueeze()` already (Thanks @umanwizard !), I can work on `mm(S, S)` for you if you still need it. It would be very helpful if you can point me to places that use `torch.ger` in your model.
